page.title: 28A day in the life.
page.content:
Saturday 11th June 2011

Today I woke up and I just realised it was the Summer Fair today so I hurried to the bathroom and brushed my teeth and had a shower and quickly ate my breakfast. I got dressed and got my money out for the games.

When I got to the fair I saw Simona and said hello. I entered her competition then I got hungry and I went and bought a burger. Next I went on the bouncy castle, I fell off a couple of times but it was fun.

Next I saw Elliot win a coconut so I thought I`d win one too then I sat down because I was running around too much. Then we went home.

I really enjoyed this day.


Pupil- Montbelle School
